title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
ead. You can run a Skill Check (Persuade/Intimidate) in order to convince Zarys to allow you to live and finish the job but you have to kill Rugan. IF YOU OPEN THE CHEST, THE ONLY OPTION IS TO KILL EVERYONE IN THE ZHENTARIM HIDEOUT

Intimidate Brem for a discount on Oskar's Freedom

Pass the high intimidation roll to force Brem for a discount.

Buy Oskar's Freedom

Spend the money. 1000 gold without the discount, 600 if you managed to get a discount.

Give Oskar some money for the journey home.
